SELECT USRID, USRNM, MPNO, NA_BZPLC, strg_dt FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_USR
WHERE usrnm LIKE '%'||#{data1}||'%'

SELECT A.MENU_ID , A.MNNM_CNTN AS MENU_NM , A.MENU_LVL_C , A.SORT_SQ , A.PGID , B.FLNM , A.UYN , B.PGMNM , A.ICON_NM , CASE WHEN A.MENU_LVL_C = '2' THEN A.MENU_ID WHEN A.MENU_LVL_C = '3' THEN SUBSTR(A.MENU_ID, 1, 4) || '00' END AS SCD_MENU_ID , CASE WHEN A.MENU_LVL_C = '2' THEN A.MNNM_CNTN WHEN A.MENU_LVL_C = '3' THEN (SELECT MNNM_CNTN FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_MENU WHERE MENU_ID = SUBSTR(A.MENU_ID, 1, 4) || '00') END AS scd_menu_nm FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_MENU A , TB_LA_IS_MM_PGM B , (SELECT MENU_ID FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(MENU_ID,1,4)||'00' AS MENU_ID FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_MENU_AUTH WHERE GRP_C = #{ss_grp_c} AND AUTH_YN = '1' GROUP BY SUBSTR(MENU_ID,1,4) UNION ALL SELECT MENU_ID FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_MENU_AUTH WHERE GRP_C = #{ss_grp_c} AND AUTH_YN = '1' GROUP BY MENU_ID ) ) C WHERE A.MENU_LVL_C != '1' AND A.UYN = '1' AND A.PGID = B.PGID(+) AND A.MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID ORDER BY A.MENU_ID
SELECT A.PGID , A.PGMNM , A.FLNM FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_PGM A WHERE A.PGM_DSC = '2' AND A.UYN != '0'

SELECT A.PGID , MAX((CASE A.BTN_C WHEN '001' THEN A.UYN ELSE '0' END)) as B_REFRESH , MAX((CASE A.BTN_C WHEN '002' THEN A.UYN ELSE '0' END)) as B_SEARCH , MAX((CASE A.BTN_C WHEN '003' THEN A.UYN ELSE '0' END)) as B_SELECT , MAX((CASE A.BTN_C WHEN '004' THEN A.UYN ELSE '0' END)) as B_INSERT , MAX((CASE A.BTN_C WHEN '005' THEN A.UYN ELSE '0' END)) as B_SAVE , MAX((CASE A.BTN_C WHEN '006' THEN A.UYN ELSE '0' END)) as B_DELETE , MAX((CASE A.BTN_C WHEN '007' THEN A.UYN ELSE '0' END)) as B_EXCEL , MAX((CASE A.BTN_C WHEN '008' THEN A.UYN ELSE '0' END)) as B_PRINT FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_PGM_BTN A GROUP BY A.PGID;

SELECT B.WK_GRP_C AS GRP_C , C.MENU_ID , MAX(CASE C.BTN_TPC WHEN 'C' THEN NVL(C.AUTH_YN,'0') else '0' end) as AUTH_C , MAX(CASE C.BTN_TPC WHEN 'R' THEN NVL(C.AUTH_YN,'0') else '0' end) as AUTH_R , MAX(CASE C.BTN_TPC WHEN 'U' THEN NVL(C.AUTH_YN,'0') else '0' end) as AUTH_U , MAX(CASE C.BTN_TPC WHEN 'D' THEN NVL(C.AUTH_YN,'0') else '0' end) as AUTH_D , MAX(CASE C.BTN_TPC WHEN 'X' THEN NVL(C.AUTH_YN,'0') else '0' end) as AUTH_X , MAX(CASE C.BTN_TPC WHEN 'P' THEN NVL(C.AUTH_YN,'0') else '0' end) as AUTH_P FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_GRP B JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MENU_AUTH C ON(B.WK_GRP_C = C.GRP_C) WHERE B.WK_GRP_C = #{ss_grp_c} GROUP BY B.WK_GRP_C , C.MENU_ID

SELECT A.SIMP_C , A.SIMP_TPC , A.SIMP_C_GRP_SQNO , A.SIMP_C_YN , A.SIMP_CNM , A.PRET_SIMP_TPC , A.PRET_SIMP_C , A.SORT_SQ , A.AMN_HCNT , A.AMN_HCNT2 , A.AMN_HCNT3 , A.AMN_HCNT4 , A.AMN_HCNT5 , A.AMN_HCNT6 , A.AMN_HCNT7 , A.AMN_HCNT8 , A.AMN_HCNT9 , A.AMN_HCNT10 , A.AMN_HCNT11 FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_COMN_APL A WHERE A.BSN_DSC = 'LM' ORDER BY A.SIMP_TPC , A.SORT_SQ
